trans-unit.source: Provides data for a cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: 提供可取消事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: A cancelable event is raised by a component when it is about to perform an action that can be canceled, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 即將執行的動作，可以取消，例如時的元件所引發的可取消事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event is deprecated and has been replaced by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>事件已被取代，而且已被取代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>。

trans-unit.source: It is offered as an example here only to illustrate the usage of <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 提供做為範例這裡只是為了說明使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to indicate whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> 提供<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性，指出是否應該取消事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventHandler> to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventHandler>處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a class-level <xref:System.Boolean> variable named `isDataSaved`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼假設您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別層級<xref:System.Boolean>名為變數`isDataSaved`。

trans-unit.source: It also assumes that you have added a statement to invoke the `OtherInitialize` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> method or the constructor (after the call to `InitializeComponent`).
trans-unit.target: 它也假設您已經加入陳述式來叫用`OtherInitialize`方法從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>方法或建構函式 (在呼叫之後`InitializeComponent`)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> class with the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel" /> property set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> 屬性設定成 <see langword="false" /> 來初始化 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cancel the event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消事件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> class with the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel" /> property set to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> 屬性設定成指定值來初始化 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否應該取消事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event should be canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該要取消事件則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventHandler> to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventHandler>處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a class-level <xref:System.Boolean> variable named `isDataSaved`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼假設您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別層級<xref:System.Boolean>名為變數`isDataSaved`。

trans-unit.source: It also assumes that you have added a statement to invoke the `OtherInitialize` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> method or the constructor (after the call to `InitializeComponent`).
trans-unit.target: 它也假設您已經加入陳述式來叫用`OtherInitialize`方法從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>方法或建構函式 (在呼叫之後`InitializeComponent`)。
